message.1:
Scheinbar bist du nicht eingeloggt!
Logge dich einfach über deinen osu!-Account ein und du kannst sofort anfangen, abzustimmen / zu nominieren!
message.2:
Du kannst dich danach auch noch bei Discord anmelden, aber es ist nicht notwending um nominieren/abstimmen zu können.
Discord Login ist erfordert für an MCA/AYIM arbeitendes Personal.

login.authOsu: Klicke hier, um dich über osu! zu authentifizieren
login.authDiscord: Klicke hier, um dich über Discord zu authentifizieren

message.2019:
Hallo 2020. A Year in Mapping 2019 ist zurück um euch die Rekordbrüche des Jahres und detailierte Statistiken zu bringen! Mit dieser Website können wir jetzt so viel Informationen für alle Jahre sammeln wie wir wollen! Wenn ihr Vorschläge habt könnt ihre diese VINXIS im Corsace Server mitteilen (Link links unten)

ZUSÄTZLICH KANN JEDER KOMMENTARE SCHREIBEN! Das heißt, dass DU einem Kommentar für so viele Mapper wie du willst schreiben und einreichen kannst!

Wähle deinen bevorzugten Mode mit den Icons unten aus um loszulegen!
message.2020:
Hallo 2021... dieses Mal das korrekte Jahr!

A Year in Mapping 2020 ist direkt nochmal da, um euch die Rekordbrüche und Statistiken DIESES Jahres auch noch zu bringen!

Und auch diese mal sind die Kommentare wieder für jeden frei verfügbar! Also, wählt euren bevorzugen Mode mit den Icons unten aus um loszulegen!
message.2021:
2022 is here!

A Year in Mapping 2021 is here to provide the records and stats made or even broken!
message.2022:
Welcome to 2023!

A Year in Mapping 2022 is here to provide the records and stats made or even broken! This time actually (kind of) on schedule!
message.2023:
2024 is now here!

A Year in Mapping 2023 is here to provide the records and stats made or even broken!

comments.name: KOMMENTARE
comments.info: Alle Kommentare werden nach Bekanntgabe der MCA Ergebnisse veröffentlicht! Du kannst bis dahin deine eigenen Kommentare einreichen.
comments.writeHere: Schreibe einen neuen Kommentar für diesen Mapper hier!
comments.login: Logge dich ein um einem Kommentar zu erstellen!
comments.notice:
Hello! This may be the first time you have navigated to (one of) the comments page!
Please note that comments are crowdfunded!
Anyone (including you) can write comments for anyone until this year's MCA is done!
Write about what they did or their achievements in [YEAR] to show appreciation to the mappers participating in the community!

message.2019:
Mapper's Choice Awards ist zurück für Runde 4 in 2019! Hierbei handelt es sich um eine Abstimmung, bei der jeder Mapper/Modder seine Favoriten nominieren bzw. für sie stimmen kann!

Unser Ziel ist es, durch die Augen der Mapping Community eine neue Perspektive auf die besten Maps von 2019 zu bringen!

Dieses Jahr haben wir sogar eine komplett neue Website, um das Nominieren und Abstimmen so einfach wie möglich zu machen!

Alle osu!supporter Preise werden von osu! selbst bereitgestellt. 2 Monate für die Gewinner von individuellen Kategorien, und 6 Monate für die Gewinner der Hauptpreise!

Wir hoffen, dass so viele wie möglich an diesem Event teilnehmen! Falls du irgenwelche Bugs oder Probleme mit der Website findest, teile es VINXIS im corsace Discord Server mit!
message.2020:
Und direkt nochmal, Mapper's Choice Awards ist zurück um es mit Runde 5 in 2020 abzuschließen! Hierbei handelt es sich um eine Abstimmung, bei der jeder Mapper/Modder seine Favoriten nominieren bzw. für sie stimmen kann!

Unser Ziel ist es, durch die Augen der Mapping Community eine neue Perspektive auf die besten Maps von 2019 zu bringen!

Wir haben viele Änderungen vorgenommen und hoffentlich alle Bugs, die währen MCA 2019 gefunden worden, behoben. Zusätzlich haben wir Kategorien wie nötig geändert, was bedeutet dass es dieses mal viel glatter gehen sollte!

Wir hoffen, dass so viele wie möglich an diesem Event teilnehmen!
message.2021:
Mapper's Choice Awards is back again for 2021! This is a voting event where all mappers/modders can nominate and vote what they think is the best map/mapper for each category!

All osu! supporter prizes are provided by the osu! staff directly. 2 months of supporter for winners of each category, and 4 months for winners of the Grand Awards!

We hope as many participants as possible take part in this event!
message.2022:
We are back for another installment of Mapper's Choice Awards! (This time almost on schedule!)
This is a voting event where all mappers/modders can nominate and vote what they think is the best map/mapper for each category!
All osu! supporter prizes are provided by the osu! staff directly. 2 months of supporter for winners of each category, and 4 months for winners of the Grand Awards!
We hope as many participants as possible take part in this event!
message.2023:
New year, new iteration of Mapper's Choice Awards!
This is a voting event where all mappers and modders can nominate and vote what they think is the best map/mapper for each category!
All osu! supporter prizes are provided by the osu! staff directly. 2 months of supporter for winners of each category, and 4 months for winners of the Grand Awards!
We hope as many participants as possible take part in this event!

complex.description: The best beatmap with extensive usage of uncommon snappings, including doubles, 1/3, 1/5, 1/7, and more.

unorthodox.description: The best beatmap showcasing mapping techniques or ideas that are not frequently seen.

mostInnovative.name: Most Innovative
mostInnovative.description: The one who influenced and provided inspiration to others the most.

simplisticTaiko.description: The best beatmap in using simple patterning and rhythm.

technicalCatch.description: The best beatmap which utilizes concepts that push the boundaries of catch gameplay.

antiMetaCatch.description: The best beatmap at using unconventional / gimmicky patterning.

unconventionalCtb.name: Best Unconventional AR/CS
unconventionalCtb.description: The best beatmap with unusual AR (Approx. <=8.5) or unusual CS (Approx. >=5, <=3).

diversity.description: The best beatmap focusing on many skillsets / categories.

altSwing.description: The best beatmap focusing on alt-styled or swing-styled beatmaps.

highDifficulty.name: Best High Difficulty

complexOnly.name: Best Complex
complexOnly.description: The best beatmap with extensive usage of uncommon snappings.

unorthodoxTaiko.name: Best Unorthodox
unorthodoxTaiko.description: The best beatmap that utilizes gimmicks and/or concepts.

unorthodoxCatch.name: Best Unorthodox
unorthodoxCatch.description: The best beatmap that strongly deviates from common norms.

antiMetaMapper.name: Best Anti Meta
antiMetaMapper.description: The one who created the best 5K/6K/8K/9K beatmaps.

motionDesign.name: Best Motion Design / Animation
motionDesign.description: The storyboard with the most satisfying animations and transitions.

lyrics.name: Best Lyrics / Text
lyrics.description: The best storyboard that utilizes well-designed text effects for lyrics.

nom_vote.search: Suche nach einer Map / einer Person
nom_vote.votingOverlay:
Hello! this may be the first time you have navigated to the voting page!
MCA Voting utilizes ranked choice voting!
This means you can select any number of beatmaps/users to vote for!
All votes are ordered by choice, so the first choice will have the highest priority!
Your first choice will count until it loses the race. Then your second, then your third, then 4th, e.t.c.
Good luck and can't wait to see the results for MCA [YEAR]

results.resultsOverlay:
Hello! This is possibly the first time you have navigated to the results page!
These results show the final placements of the beatmaps/users using ranked choice voting, alongside the amount of times the beatmap/user was a first choice, and the total number of appearances!
Hopefully these results for MCA [YEAR] are to your liking! Can't wait to see you all for next MCA!

home.description: Dive into Corsace Open 2023 - where the world's osu! elites battle it out.

info.title: INFORMATION

error.message: You cannot create/join a qualifier until you have {numPlayers} players!

errors.size: Image is too large. Ensure the image is less than 5MB.
errors.type: Invalid image file. Ensure the image is a PNG or JPG.
errors.invalidImage: Invalid image file. Ensure the image is a PNG or JPG and is less than 5MB.
errors.contactVinxis: Contact VINXIS as there is a search error. See console for more details via Ctrl + Shift + I.

confirm.deleteTeam: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
confirm.deleteTeamFinal: Are you REALLY sure you want to delete this team? This can't be undone!
confirm.removeMember: Are you sure you want to remove {username} from your team?
confirm.transferManager: Are you sure you want to transfer manager to {username}?
confirm.invite: Are you sure you want to invite {username} to your team?
confirm.removeInvite: Are you sure you want to remove {username}'s invite to your team?
confirm.unregister: Are you sure you want to unregister from this tournament? You can re-register at any time if you still have 6 members.

headers.becomeMember: become a member and play as well
headers.requiredMessageExact: You need exactly {minTeamSize} team members to register and join a qualifier
headers.requiredMessageRange: You need within {minTeamSize} to {maxTeamSize} team members to register and join a qualifier

registration.toPlay: To play in Corsace Open, get 6 members, and choose a qualifier date and time below

teams.notRegistered: Currently not registered in Corsace Open.

create.title: CREATE A TEAM
create.info2: Please ensure all information is correct before finalizing.
create.teamLength: 5 - 20 characters. DO NOT put "team" in the name, it will be automatically removed. Profanity will be checked.
create.timezoneText: We will assume your team can play between 10:00 to 22:00 in the selected timezone.
create.fileSizeError: file size too big! please upload a smaller image
create.fileTypeError: incorrect file type! please upload a .jpg or .png
create.avatarInfo1: It's recommended to use a 3:1 aspect ratio for your avatar.
create.avatarInfo2: Captains can modify team names and avatars before registrations close.
create.avatarInfo3: All names and avatars will be approved by staff.
create.avatarInfo4: If deemed inappropriate, you will be notified to make changes.
create.teamManagers:
Team managers (that is you) have the option to play and be captain simultaneously
OR not play with the team and only be captain.
create.teamManagersFree: If you wish to not play, and only act as a manager, you will not take up a player slot.
create.selectManager: Select this checkbox if you are not going to play with the team, and only act as manager.
create.confirmManager:
By checking this, I will only act as manager, and I understand I will not be able to participate
in any matches.
